body:
# Welcome!!!
My name is David Silva, born and raised in [Lisbon](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lisbon), [Portugal](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oh3W1_x7KbY). I've always had a passion for software and technology. I love to create software to make people's lives easier, simpler and fun!

I've been working as a Web Developer since mid 2009, and with Ruby on Rails since December 2010, since then I couldn't go back, I fell in love with the simplicity of the language and how Ruby on Rails could make web development seem so easy!


### Living in London
I've been living in London since January 2013, I moved here some days after my birthday, to work with this great company that is [HouseTrip](http://housetrip.com). I've been working with some of the best developers I ever met and I can say I've been learning a lot with them since the beginning of the year, and I can't stop absorbing their knowledge everyday.

### @HouseTrip
As as developer, I work with 5 team members, 4 Developers (counting 1 Lead Developer) and 1 Product Manager. Our goal is to make our Hosts have the best experience when publishing their own property on our platform!

Here at HouseTrip we like to think before we act, we discuss new features and how we can we bring more value by building new features as a team. That's one of the things I felt in love when I joined - we discuss, we plan and we build together!

There is teamwork, and there is no such thing as being stuck during days with some problem, we work as a team and we solve problems together.


### Tech Fridays
Yes, we do have Tech Fridays (Yeah!!!), we use them to work with different people and build better tools for us and for the business. On Tech Fridays is when we can bring our ideas to see the light of the day.

### Where can you find me?

Twitter: [@davidslv](http://twitter.com/davidslv), LinkedIn: [davidslv](http://www.linkedin.com/in/davidslv)
